meanings.definition: The act of saying 'hello' or greeting someone.
meanings.sent1: The hulloing of the children could be heard from across the playground.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy the hulloing of my neighbors when I come home.
meanings.sent3: The loud hulloing of the parrot made everyone in the room burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The hulloing of the birds in the morning signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: His cheerful hulloing brightened up the room instantly.

meanings.definition: The act of calling out or trying to get someone's attention by saying 'hello'.
meanings.sent1: The hulloing of the lost hiker echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent2: I heard the hulloing of my friend from across the street.
meanings.sent3: The persistent hulloing of the salesman finally caught my attention.
meanings.sent4: The distant hulloing of the ship signaled its arrival at the port.
meanings.sent5: Her excited hulloing could be heard over the phone.
